title: Table for Two with the Potash Twins
description:
Adeev and Ezra Potash are twins, horn players, and foodies. So whenever they’d come home from touring the world, they’d recreate the dishes they fell in love with on the road — and now, they want to help you make your favorite takeout meals, too.

Follow the twins on Instagram, Twitter, and Facebook

Stream Takeout Twins on the Food Network Kitchen App

Listen ad free with Wondery+. Join Wondery+ for exclusives, binges, early access, and ad free listening. Available in the Wondery App. 

Tell us what’s making you smile! Send a voice memo to smile@wondery.com 

Our theme song is “Smile” by Ryan Innes
